title: introduce oneself to
author: dmxgzsx
txt_content:
Dear Friends of mcbbc Forum；

Hello, everyone from MCBBS forum,I am a player who loves MC very much. I have been playing MC for 7 years. Today officially entered the mcbbs forum to discuss and play MC with you. I hope you can take care of it! Thank you very much.



                                                                                              Letter from dmxgzsx
                                                                               August 17，two thousand and twenty year

replies.author: dmxgzsx
replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content: 说中文不好吗.   please don't  tell me that you are a foreigner
